title: Kadhal Nergayil Lyrics Nimirndhu Nil Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kadhal Nergayil
Singer(s): Javed Ali, GV Prakash, Shasha
Lyrics : Kabilan
MOvie: Nimirndhu Nil
Music: GV Prakash

Kadhal Nergayil, mounam pesumn
kadhal parvayil, kangal koosum
Manal saalayil nadandhenadi
mazhai ootrinaai uyire.
Madhil ponnayaai irundhenadi
ennai maatrinaai uyire.

Nee yaaro, nee yaaro
nee thaan en yevaalo.
Kadhal Nergayil, mounam pesum
kadhal parvayil, kangal koosum

Oondhal vinai nee, koyil yaanai naan.
Undhan kangalaal oorai paarkiren.
Paaraipola vazhandha naaney
sirpam aagiren.
Paadhi dhooram pona pinney
paadhai kaangiren.

Kadhal Nergayil, mounam pesum
kadhal parvayil, kangal koosum
Manal saalayil nadandhenadi
mazhai ootrinaai uyire.
Madhil ponnayaai irundhenadi
ennai maatrinaai uyire.

Nee yaaro, nee yaaro
nee endhan aadhaamo.
Thaedi paarkiren ennai naaney.
pedhai yaavumey neeyaai aanen.
